version_description:
- Hand of Midas reverted back to stronger at boss battles
- Can now save up to 3 clan crates
- Time-Cheater Prevention
- Selling equipments bug fix
- Prestige Relic bug fix
- Skill Tree UI update
- Daily Reward gives perk correctly
- Power of Swiping not affecting pet bug fix
- Hero balancing

- New items for Shop
- Able to show game in scientific notation
- Boss & Chesterson gold bug fixed
- Fixed clan crashes
- Fixed stats panel crashing issue
- Clan Chat Optimizations
- Fixed Fairy reducing active skill timer"

- Fixed Shop items
- Active Skill cool down decreases when game is not running
- Game Balancing

- Artifact Heavenly Sword calculation bug fixed
- Heroes Skill buying animation fixed
- Titan Boss shows equipment icon UI when it will drop an equipment
- Diamond Fairy Videos fixed
- Helper Skill unlocking animation glitch fixed
- Stage and Skill Tree button UI fixes
- Fixed people missing in-app-purchase diamond issues

- Notification when new titan lord shows up
- Fixed hero weapon set bonus bug
- Fixed fairy diamonds for video skippable players
- Scientific Mode doesn't show scientific notation until AA is reached
- Clan quest polishes
- Clan crate bug fixed

- Localization fixes
- UI fixes
- Crash fixes

TAP TO SHARE THE LOVE
The GLOBAL EVENT to celebrate Valentine's Day is here! 
- Join tappers from all over the world to complete the goals, and win special prizes! 

A SWEET NEW THEME 
- Spot the new looks on the Fairy and Chesterson  
- Check out the fresh designs on coins and stages... (and even more)! 

MORE TO EXPLORE
- Equipment Farming Introduced
- NEW Avatars to unlock! 

Features Updated 
- Hand of Midas Update 
- Player Profile Update
- Clan Dungeon Update

Bug Fixes
- Duplicate Rewards from the Chest fixed

TAP TO SHARE THE LOVE
The GLOBAL EVENT to celebrate Valentine's Day is here! 
- Join tappers from all over the world to complete the goals, and win special prizes! 

A SWEET NEW THEME 
- Spot the new looks on the Fairy and Chesterson  
- Check out the fresh designs on coins and stages... (and even more)! 

MORE TO EXPLORE
- Equipment Farming Introduced
- NEW Avatars to unlock! 

Features Updated 
- Hand of Midas Update 
- Player Profile Update
- Clan Dungeon Update

Bug Fixes
- Duplicate Equipments from the Chest fixed

TAP TO SHARE THE LOVE
The GLOBAL EVENT to celebrate Valentine's Day is here! 
- Join tappers from all over the world to complete the goals, and win special prizes! 

A SWEET NEW THEME 
- Spot the new looks on the Fairy and Chesterson  
- Check out the fresh designs on coins and stages... (and even more)! 

MORE TO EXPLORE
- Equipment Farming Introduced
- NEW Avatars to unlock! 

Features Updated 
- Hand of Midas Update 
- Player Profile Update
- Clan Dungeon Update

Bug Fixes
- Duplicate Equipments from the Chest fixed

- Battery Saving Mode
- Hand of Midas applies Artifact Bonuses
- Artifact bulk buy toggle for +10
- Bug fixes for Valentine's Event

- Added Clan Button in Player Profile
- Valentine's Theme removed

- Daily Quests
- Confirmation panel when selling legendary equipment
- Panel to show when there's a diamond count mismatch on the server and client
- Clan Quest optimization
- Clan button in Player Profile fixed

- Daily Reward with Chest Tokens
- Inbox System for announcements
- Clan leader can now send announcements to members (with push notifications)
- Relic Achievement Bug fixed
- Relic Exploit on Prestige fixed

- Daily Reward with Chest Tokens
- Inbox System for announcements
- Clan leader can now send announcements to members (with push notifications)
- Relic Achievement Bug fixed
- Relic Exploit on Prestige fixed
- Fixed clan leader 30 seconds black screen when doing clan settings
- Fixed daily reward button not disabled after collection bug
- Minor UX improvements
- iOS performance improvements

- New Clan Role & more powers to Master
- Clan: Internet Connection Required check
- Stage Transition Locking Timer
- Stats Panel and Heroes Upgrade Panel badge icon fixed
- Push Notification: added badges to icon (iOS)
- Tournament Bracket and Rewards with Titan Points

- Show Stage Transition Locking alert panel
- Fixed Inactive gold calculation (does not include active skills now)
- Fixed passcode UI for private clans

- Daily Achievement balance tweak 
        Clan Quest Attacks: Decreased by 33%
        Pet Attacks:  Increased by 900%
        Active Skill Use: Decreased by 80%
- Swapped Hero Skill: Damon of the Darkness  / Finn the Funny Guard first five skill swapped back
- Showing equipment level in reward screen
- Fixed Clan Dungeon crash
- Fixed Clan Create formula

- Stage cap lifted to stage 4000 
- Gold Balancing: 
        Hand of Midas bonus pot gold for bosses has been decreased by 30%.
        Hand of Midas bonus pot gold for Chestersons has been increased by 200%.
        Base Chesterson gold has been increased by 50%.
        Fairy gold drop amounts have been increased and now have a chance to drop 10x gold.
        Make it Rain and Clan Crate gold have been greatly increased.

- LiL' Ursa visual bug when using the Heroic Might enhancement.
- Fixed Lorebook being empty after download progress.
- The maximum player critical chance has been increased from 50% to 60%.
- A bug preventing fat fairy spawns has been fixed.
- The visual display of the hero weapon set bonus has been corrected (net hero DPS is unchanged).

- Special Chest Sales
- Power of Swipe buffs (work on clan quest bosses, do full 20 taps/sec, don't need to swipe fast to activate)
- Mystery Chest is redeemable with Chest Tokens in Bear Shop
- Chest tier updates as soon as the stage requirement is reached
- Helper weapons descriptions bug fixed
- Last played time on player profile bug fixed
- Hero story localization fixes
- UI fixes & improvements
- Bear Shop fixes
- prestige bug fixes
- fixed background music issue

- Fixed monster's initial HP for starting new stage after prestige
- Clan Quest Panel crashing bug fixed due to sheen on fight button
- Clan Quest Panel contribution section scrolling fixed
- Power of Swiping duration increased from 8 to 12hrs, cost increased from 80 to 100 diamonds.
- New clan members cannot participate in an already started Clan Quest of above 100, but can participate if they join right before a new clan quest begins.
- A basic gameplay tutorial was added to the options panel.
- Tutorial (Help Manual) text fixed
- Disabled "Mini Boss" overlay text for mini bosses when there are at most 4 non-boss spawns per stage.

-Added in-game Tutorial 
-Background Transition feature unlock changed from stage 2000 to 1000
-Bear Store chest limit increase
-Mana Siphon improvement and visual change
-Ultra Heroes improvement
-Warcry skill improvement
-Shadow Clone skill improvement
-Heroic Might improvement and visual change
-Make it Rain improvement
-Clan Crate improvement
-Clan Ship improvements and display changes
-Sword Master DPS fix
-Equipment drop bug fix

- Active skill cost fixed
- Tournament crash fixed
- Number display fixed
- Clan message crash fixed
- Fairy video ads fixed

- Active skill cost fixed
- Tournament crash fixed
- Number display fixed
- Clan message crash fixed
- Fairy video ads fixed

Brand new skill tree featuring all-new, customizable character classes for you to choose from. And that's not all - below is a list of other exciting content for you to explore: 
- 2 artifacts
- 2 backgrounds
- 20 new equipment
- 41 new Titans 
- 1000 more stages to play through (with more to come!) 
- Brand new skill tree with 34 skills to unlock

Brand new skill tree featuring all-new, customizable character classes for you to choose from. And that's not all - below is a list of other exciting content for you to explore: 
- 2 artifacts
- 2 backgrounds
- 20 new equipment
- 41 new Titans 
- 1000 more stages to play through (with more to come!) 
- Brand new skill tree with 34 skills to unlock

Brand new skill tree featuring all-new, customizable character classes for you to choose from. And that's not all - below is a list of other exciting content for you to explore: 
- 2 artifacts
- 2 backgrounds
- 20 new equipment
- 41 new Titans 
- 1000 more stages to play through (with more to come!) 
- Brand new skill tree with 34 skills to unlock

- Max stage increased to 6000!
- v2.0 Titan Chest Promotion extended until October 16th!

Skill Tree Stats Upgrade Preview:
- The stats panel is now accessible from the skill tree.
- Stats reflect skills that are upgraded but not yet applied/finalized, giving a preview of skill tree changes.

Balance Tweaks:
- Midas Ultimate and Manni Mana had their positions swapped in the Sorcerer Tree.
- Tactical Insight was significantly reduced at the highest levels, yet now scales more uniformly from level to level.
- The base delay between inactive Titan spawns was reduced from 0.7s to 0.6s.
- Cleaving Strike had a small damage reduction.
- Limit Break now gives +500 mana capacity at it's maximum level, up from +365.
- The Fire Sword skill tree upgrade damage increased.
- Lightning Burst cooldown was reduced to 25s from 30s.
- Astral Awakening duration was increased to 30s from 25s.
- Legendary and Rare equipment drop rates were both increased by 25%.
- Lightning Strike now has a greater chance to trigger at lower upgrade levels.
- Dimensional Shift is now stronger at lower upgrade levels.
- Monster HP growth reduced over the first 100 stages of play.
- Monster HP after stage 100 reduced by roughly 50% per stage.
- Tournament bracket algorithm improvements.

Bug Fixes:
- Fire Sword bonus was being counted twice on Sword Master attacks.
- Fairy cooldown times were roughly twice as long as intended.
- Tournament +mana capacity will now correctly apply when loading the game.
- Tournament brackets ranges will now correctly form (these ranges were initially much larger than intended).
- Undisputed Champion visual correction; the bonus reward was showing even though there were ties a given tournament.
- Equipment farm range was much higher than intended.

"Features:
- Skill tree resets are now limited to once per prestige: this was implemented to make tournaments more fair for everyone.
- Forced Skill Tree Reset promotion: 75% off all skill tree resets until 10/23.
- Using 'Buy Max' with rounding enabled will snap upgrade amounts to hero improvement upgrade levels.
- Pet Heart of Midas now clearly shows gold amounts dropped.
- Equipment can now be locked and unlocked while equipped.
- Public player ID display for easier support with player accounts.
- Public tournament ID display for easier support with tournaments.
- Twitch Avatar added for Twitch subscribers.

Balancing:
- Skill Tree Tier IV upgrades are now *much* stronger and scale more efficiently.
- Warlord and Shadow Clone pushing strength increased.
- All skill tree gold upgrades as well as several damage upgrades scale more efficiently now.
- Reduced the damage upgrade strength of Angelic Radiance.
- Increased base Shadow Clone damage and reduced the penalty from having a low critical chance value.
- Hand of Midas increases fairy gold by default without Midas Ultimate, but at a reduced bonus amount.
- Reduced Titanlord hitpoints for easier Clan Quests.
- Equipment farming range increased to drop between 85% and 99% of your max stage.
- Fairy Charm set to a maximum of 10 upgrade levels that each scale stronger now.
- Fairy average cooldown reduced from 150s to 120s.

Bug Fixes:
- Inactive DPS calculation fixes (some *active* skill components were being included).
- Clan crate not spawning if the Clan Ship was about to fire fix.
- Equipment rapid back and forth swapping giving inflated bonuses exploit fix.
- Fairy gold bonus listed on Midas Ultimate now included in fairy gold drop amounts.
- Added brief cooldown to some perks to avoid accidental perk spamming.
- Perk gold fix, increasing gold from perks back to v2.0 amounts.
- Pet swapping to continually increase Shadow Clone damage exploit fix.
- Deadly Strike now correctly gives reduced damage bonus to Heavenly Strike.
- Splash through boss attacks sometimes incorrectly skipping non-boss titans when no splash kills were made.
- Dimensional Shift no longer visually buffs secondary active skill effects.
- Dimensional Shift now correctly stacks multiple active skills with Heavenly Strike for increased damage.
- Heroic Might wasn't increasing Tap Damage via Tap Damage from Heroes during War Cry."

Features:
- Increased Stage Cap to 7000!
- 10 new Artifacts to collect!
- Halloween theme with new limited time equipment to collect!
- Yort Kingdom has been transformed into a Spooky Graveyeard!
- Stats Panel improvements: stats now reflect active damage and effect bonuses from skill tree upgrades like Barbaric Fury.

New Artifacts Bonuses:
- Inactive Gold, Fairy Gold, Splash Gold
- Sword Attack Damage, Inactive Damage, Splash Damage
- All Active Skill Effect Bonus, All Active Skill Effect Duration
- Mana Capacity, Sword Master Cost Reduction

New Equipment:
- New Legendary Shadow Clone Damage Slash (permanent addition).
- Limited time Halloween theme equipment looks that can be obtained as common equipment drops with boosted stats.
- Collect 5 new themed weapons along with a new armor, helmet, aura, and slash!

Balancing: 
- Sword Attack Damage gives slightly reduced bonus to Heavenly Strike.
- Pet HoM gives greater base gold that scales with your current stage but receives a reduced bonus from Hand of Midas.
- Relics earned per stage has increased at higher stages.
- Artifacts have been given improvement upgrades for better scaling.
- Artifact unlock costs for number 41 and above have been increased.
- Book of Shadows is guaranteed by the 40th Artifact unlock.

Bug Fixes:
- Silent March was doing reduced damage when the game needed to fully load.
- War Cry bonus wasn't immediately visually reflected Heroic Might upgrades.

End of Halloween Update.

Features:
- 10 more new Artifacts to collect (up to 60 total Artifacts)!
- Active skills have pop-in multi buy buttons, similar to the Artifact multi-buy buttons.
- Active skills can be canceled while activated so that they can be upgraded immediately.
- Consecutive Titanlord Attack Bonus! Repeat attacks against the same Titanlord get an increasing damage bonus.
- Advanced power saving mode options panel.
- Limited time event equipment now marked as such in the equipment scroll list.
- 9:18.5 Aspect ratio support for newer devices.
- Undisputed Champion Avatar.

New Artifact Bonuses:
- Pet Damage Bonus Multiplier (increases damage bonuses listed on pets).
- Pet Gold Bonus Multiplier (increases gold bonuses listed on pets).
- Multi-Spawn Chance.
- Titan Damage Bonus (bonus damage against non-boss monsters).
- Boss Damage Bonus (bonus damage against bosses).
- Monster HP Reduction (reduces HP of all monster types; does *not* reduce gold drops).
- Equipment Multiplier Boost (increases the effect of all non-Aura equipment types).
- Mana Regeneration.
- Critical Damage Bonus.
- Increased Boss Timer Duration (extends the length of boss fights).

Balancing:
- Active skill timers now tick down while the game is paused (this was to address a mana exploit with active skills).
- Dimensional Shift now reduces active skill timer rates (active skills last longer), instead of reducing the boss timer rate.
- Artifact effect scaling improved (noticable at higher upgrade levels).
- Bonus Splash Gold now boosts Pet Heart of Midas.
- Multi-Spawn now spawns a minimum of 2 monsters per spawn (up from 1).
- Hand of Midas tap and pot gold now increased by average 10x gold bonus.
- Reduced Monster HP scaling after stage 4000.

Bug Fixes:
- Dimensional Shift bonus not applying when called after other skills were already active.
- Dimensional Shift bonus not applying on game resume.
- Removed temporary bonuses from Barbaric Fury, Coordinated Offensive, and Astral Awakening from Inactive DPS.
- Incorrect Shadow Clone damage updating when pets were swapped while Shadow Clone was active.
- Splash through boss attacks would stop doing damage when the attack timed out (usually happened in tournaments).
- Sword Master gold costs not properly updating (the upgrade button would stay gray when levels could be purchased).
- Skill Tree "New" icon popping up too often.
- Fairy video gold panel show different gold amount that what was dropped.

Features:
- Tap Titans Cyber Week Sale: Titan Chests give six times more relics for a limited time!

Bug Fixes:
- Active skill multi buy buttons now hide after a couple seconds.
- Active skill info panel now shows correct numbers for next mana cost and secondary effect.
- Pet bonuses weren't being applied correctly when the game was first loaded, which was affecting silent march dps and offline mana regeneration.
- Shadow Clone active skill button cooldown was ending too quickly when players had Eternal Darkness upgraded.
- Fixed Shadow Clone damage not receiving correct bonus from Firesword depending on the activation order of these skills.
- Dimensional Shift was slowing down Adrenaline Rush and Power of Swiping timers.
- Active skills can be canceled at max level; cancel button is now blue.
- Hero upgrade button now orange instead of blue.
- Highest framerate always used during Clan Quests to maximize player tap amounts.
- Update History, Clan Quest, and Shop Chest panel fixes.

Features:
- Max Stage 8000.
- Hero Ascension.
- 5 New Artifacts.
- 7 new permanent equipment additions, including the golden Anniversary equipment set!
- 14 new limited-time seasonal equipment additions with boosted stats!
- Skill tree reset cost scaling reduction (now 2 diamonds per skill point, maximum reset cost is still 800).
- Silent March Rework (now works by default after unlocking 1 upgrade level).
- Adrenaline Rush improvements.

Hero Ascension:
- Ascend heroes for an enormous damage boost (ascensions become available soon after the final 3 heroes have evolved twice).
- Ascending a hero sets that hero's level back to 1 and removes all improvement bonuses as well as evolves, but skill upgrades are retained.
- Ascended heores have new skill upgrades that overwrite their non-ascended variants as they are unlocked.
- Ascended heroes have new visual looks for each evolve level.
- Newest hero unlocks now always appear at the top of the hero scroll list instead of the bottom.
- Heroes are now limited to reaching a maximum of level 6000 (to keep things simple).
- Heroes can be both hired and leveled in one tap now after completing your first weapon set.
- Ascension status resets on prestige.

New Artifact Bonuses:
- Ground Hero Damage (denoted by new mountain icon in the hero stats panel)
- Flying Hero Damage (denoted by new feather icon in the hero stats panel)
- Companion Damage (Pet, Clan Ship, Shadow Clone)
- All Upgrade Cost Reduction (gold costs for Sword Master, Heroes, and Active Skills)
- Active Skill Cooldown Reduction

Silent March Rework:
- Inactive Advancement up to 99% max-stage after unlocking the skill at level 1.
- Upgrades now increase Inactive DPS and decrease inactive spawn delay.
- Base Inactive DPS decreased from x1 to x0.01.
- Base Inactive spawn delay increased from 0.6s to 3s per monster.

Adrenaline Rush:
- Now speeds up the monster's death animation by 65% instead of speeding up the spawn rate.  This means that monsters will be on the screen more while using this perk.
- Maximum Inactive monster kill rates (inactive spawn delay) also boosted by 65%.
- Splash through boss attacks now benefit from Adrenaline Rush.

Balancing:
- Predicted player strength for tournament matchmaking cannot decrease anymore.  This was done to address players salvaging artifacts before a tournament started to gain an edge in their bracket seeding.
- Hand of Midas now gives a partial bonus to splash gold.
- Active monster death animations are now 17% faster by default.

Fixes:
- Dimensional Shift now displays an increase in skill duration for all active skills while Shadow Clone is activated; this increase in duration is removed when Shadow Clone ends (this is just a visual change, the core behavior is identical to previous versions of Dimensional Shift).
- Bonus effect descriptions are now listed for each artifact on the artifact info panel.
- Pet Evolution now also decreases required taps to charge up Lightning Burst.
- Tournament fixes for players joining at the last second.
- Fixed issue where Legendary equipment would get salvaged before other equipment rarities when a player had a full equipment list.
- Duration of previous Clan Quest level displayed on the Clan Quest info panel.
- Prestige crash issues when Active Skills were running.
- Perks now always require a confirmation to be used.
- Equipment transmorphs now show the name and rarity color of the selected look.
- Total skill points owned are listed in the skill tree.
- Artifact level moved to the left hand side of the Artifact scroll list (no more multi-buy button hiding the level).
- Coordinated Offensive can give any clan mate now (previously it was only pulling from a pool of at most 10 players).
- Mana gained from Mana Siphon and Manni Mana is now shown when High Quality Animations are disabled in the Power Options panel.
- Blue Wizard Hat changed to purple to match the icon.
- Hero stats panel redesigned to be cleaner.
- Sword Master cost button fix

Bug Fixes:
- Internet connection now required once when updating to a new version before offline gameplay is available.
- Common and rare aura effects were increased to their correct values.
- Make It Rain/Clan Crate gold fixed and now requires an active internet connection to give maximum values.
- Shop promotion display fixes.

- Fixed a rare crash for new accounts when heroes are first made available.
- Reduced Snow Storm aura intensity to address crashes on lower end devices.
- Clan Quest optimizations when high quality animations are disabled in the power options panel.
- New visuals for the Dancing Flames fire aura.

Features:
- Stage 10k.
- New *Mythic* equipment rarity!
- Equipment sets with crafting!
- Shop overhaul.

Mythic Equipment:
- New powerful equipment rarity with an *extremely* low drop rate; the primary way to obtain Mythic equipment will be through crafting using the new crafting shards.
- Will offer powerful set bonuses; the first six Mythic sets will each boost a different active skill and will also provide a multiplier to relics earned.

Equipment Sets:
- Completing a full set unlocks permanent bonuses tied to each set.
- You only need to collect each set item once to complete the set (obtain the transmorph look); each set item does not need to be hoarded in your equipment inventory to unlock the set.
- Collect Event, Rare, Legendary, and Mythic equipment sets.  Event and Rare sets will have one set bonus, Legendary sets will have two bonuses per set, and Mythic sets will be the most powerful with 3 set bonuses each.
- Equipment sets can be crafting using new Crafting Shards!  Crafting shards will be primarily available as a tournament reward in the new crafting shard/pet tournament.
- You may choose which specific set you wish to craft from; crafted items will be initially random per craft, with a large amount of bad-luck prevention on subsequent crafted items pet set.
- We are initially releasing two Mythic sets, one Legendary set, one Rare set, and one Event set.

Released Sets and Set Bonuses:
- [Mythic] (War Cry Set): Full set gives x2 Companion Attack Rate during War Cry, x100 War Cry effect, and x1.5 relics earned.
- [Mythic] (Deadly Strike Set): Full set applies full Deadly Strike bonus to inactive damage, x100 Deadly Strike effect, and x1.5 relics earned.
- [Legendary] Anniversary Set; Full set gives x5 All Gold and x5 All Damage.
- [Rare] Phantom Set: Full set gives x5 Critical Damage.
- [Event] Snow Master Set: Full set gives x5 All Hero Damage.

Shop Overhaul:
- New daily deals.
- Chest tier rebalancing (changing their stage spacing and tweaking contents).
- Titan chests will now offer fortune hero weapons instead of random hero weapons.
- Level 1 pets and common equipment will no longer drop in Titan chests.
- Wooden chest rework: These will now have more distinct contents that makes them different and unique with respect to Silver and Titan chests.
- The shop now occupies the far right tab on the bottom of the screen; perks have been moved to the Sword Master tab.
- The shop icon has been removed from the main interface and the tournament icon has been shifted upwards, leaving more free space for the clan ship.

Fixes:
- Crafting panel equipment highlighting wasn't corresponding to owned equipment.
- Updated the look of shop info panels for items, chests, and special bundles.
- Time since last prestige now updates on the prestige preview panel.
- Shop chests refresh when a new chest tier is reached.
- 'New' icon appears over shop tab when new daily deals appear.
- Shop optimizations

Features:
- Stage 12k.
- Starter bundle available for brand new accounts.

Balancing:
- Relic growth has been reduced past stage 9k; relics awarded at stage 10k were reduced by roughly 40%.
- Several daily login reward values were increased.

Fixes:
- Shop currency crash fixes.
- Server optimizations and stability improvements.
- Deadly Strike was boosting Inactive Damage when the corresponding Mythic equipment set was incomplete.
- Additional diamond price matching between Android and iOS.

Features:
- Stage 16k.
- Valentine's theme with new limited time event equipment.
- Two new equipment sets with associated special bundles: Valentine's Heartbreaker set and a Legendary Dragon Slayer set.
- 21 new peices of equipment along with new equipment Tap Damage sword bonus.
- Splash skip options added for Pet, Clan Ship, and Shadow Clone.
- New optimized artifact upgrade formula implemented which allows for seemless multi-upgrade options (including buy-max).
- Performance improvements! We have reduced the maximum amount of draw-calls being made by upwards of 40%.
- Mystery Chests removed.

New Splash Skip Upgrades:
- Pets: based on total pet levels.
- Clan Ship: based on clan quest level.
- Shadow Clone: Available via Eternal Darkness.
- Splash skip for attacks that don't splash through bosses will just function as bonus splash kills.

Mystery Chest Removal:
- Mystery Chests are no longer available; any remaining chest tokens have been converted into 25 diamonds each.
- Chest token daily login rewards were replaced with Crafting Shards.

Balancing:
- Base pet damage increased.
- Base clan ship damage reduced but hero damage bonuses from artifacts and most pet bonuses scale stronger now.
- Cooldown reduction removed from Eternal Darkness and replaced with Shadow Clone Splash Skip.
- Pet auto-attack now unlocks at total pet level 200, down from 500.
- Lightning Burst: max splash count increased from 45 to 50.
- Angelic Radiance: max splash skip increased from 30 to 40.

Fixes:
- Splash count display and corresponding gold drops now include bonus kills from splash skip.
- Additional stage requirements added for clans.
- 3 day clan auto-kick duration added and 180 day duration removed.
- Early game pop-up merchandise panel removed; merchandise can still be accessed via the options panel.
- Bank panel within the options panel has been removed.
- Many images were optimized to reduce the overall download size.
- Bundles now have info panels that list all bundle contents.
- Fixed clan crate issue

Artifact Upgrade Options:
- Toggle added to options panel to switch between flat and percentage based artifact upgrades.
- Default flat artifact upgrade options set to [x1000, x100, x10, x1].
- New percentage based artifact upgrade options set to [Max, 25%, 5%, 1%]
- Percentage upgrades are based off of your current relic count.

Balancing:
- Eternal Darkness splash skip boosted to match Angelic Radiance values (max 40 splash skip).
- Pet splash skip set to +1 per 500 total pet levels (previously +1 per 1000 levels after level 2000).
- Daily login crafting shard rewards increased by 20%.
- Increased Clan Ship stun damage.
- Decreased Intimidating Presence level requirements.

Fixes:
- Artifact upgrade lag has been fixed.
- Sword Master, Hero, and Artifact upgrade sliders have been decoupled and now may be set independently from one another.
- Fixed issue with clan bonus and splash skip incorrectly showing for clans the player is not in.
- Clan Ship stun duration was +1 second longer than listed for all upgrade levels.

Reddit Notes:
- 75% skill tree reset promotion extended to 02/20.

Features:
- Stage 20k.
- Spring theme with limited time event equipment and earn free pet eggs twice as fast for the month of April!
- Equipment Enhancements! Event, Rare, Legendary, and Mythic equipment now have random secondary stats.
- Aura Rework! Aura's now boost other equipment and no longer give chance based stats as their primary effect.
- Meet Portar! This new stage skip Titan is will warp you through additional stages when defeated.
- Equipment crafting info panels: see what bonus each craftable piece of equipment gives by tapping on it.
- 4 New equipment sets: Hand of Midas mythic set, along with a new legendary, rare, and spring event sets.
- Introducing the Artifact Graveyard, a place where you can selectively choose to unlock previously salvaged artifacts!
- 5 New Artifacts along with reworks to Stone of the Valrunes and The Master's Sword.
- 8 New pieces of non-event equipment, along with the new Unskilled Gold armor type.
- Active skills max level increased to 25.
- New player tutorial overhaul.

Equipment Enhancements:
- Each equipment category has been assigned a pool of five unique secondary stats.
- Equipment dropped before v2.7 will be given default enhancement values as per each category.
- Number of enhancements per rarity - Rare/Event: 1 enhancement, Legendary: 2 enhancements, Mythic: 3 enhancements.
- Weapon enhancements: Boosts for each of the five damage-based active skills.
- Hat enhancements: inactive damage, boss damage, non-boss damage, ground hero damage, flying hero damage.
- Suit enhancements: inactive gold, splash gold, perk gold, fairy gold, Hand of Midas gold.
- Aura enhancements: Chesterson chance, fairy multi-spawn chance, chest gold x10 chance, boss gold x10 chance, manni mana chance.
- Slash enhancements: critical chance, deadly chance, multi-spawn chance, all probability boost, Portar spawn chance.

Aura Rework:
- Auras now provide direct boosts to weapons, hats, and slashes as their primary effect.
- Previous aura chance based effects (critical chance, Chesterson chance, multi-spawn chance) have been added as enhancements on auras and slashes.
- Auras are now affected by the all equipment boost artifact.

New Equipment Sets:
- [Mythic] Treasure Hunter - x1.5 Enhanced Equipment Chance, x100 Hand of Midas Gold, x1.5 Prestige Relics.
- [Legendary] Sherwood Knight - x1.5 Pet Damage Bonuses, x0.7 Pet Skill Cooldowns.
- [Rare] Cybernetic Enhancements - x3 All Hero Damage (some common equipment was elevated to rare status to fill out this set).
- [Event] Defender of the Egg - x5 Pet Damage.

Artifact Graveyard:
- Selectively unlock previously salvaged artifacts using relics.
- Any owned or previously salvaged artifact will now be considered as 'discovered'.
- Artifact salvage cost scaling reduced but now depends on the number of artifacts you have discovered instead of the amount owned.

New Artifacts:
- Unskilled damage and unskilled gold: provide bonuses when active skills aren't running, as well as during inactive play.
- All probability boost: boosts each probability that is listed in the stats panel, including Deadly Chance, Mana Siphon, Manni Mana, and Lightning Strike!
- Mana refund percent: a percentage of mana spent on active skills is refunded each time a skill is used.
- Portar spawn chance: increases your chance to spawn Portar, the stage skip Titan.
- Stone of the Valrunes now provides a gold multiplier based on how many active skills are running (excluding Heavenly Strike).
- The Master's Sword now provides tap damage from heroes.

Bug Fixes:
-Clan message scrolling issue

Balancing:
- Rogue skill tree upgrades for Pet, Clan Ship, and Shadow Clone now give more Inactive Damage yet give a reduced bonus to Deadly Strike.
- Shadow Clone gets a stronger bonus from Tap Damage and Fire Sword (exponent increased from 0.5 to 0.67).
- Shadow Clone gets a stronger bonus from Tap Damage from Heroes (exponent increased from 0.5 to 0.6).
- Cleaving Strike now stronger to account for lower Critical Chance availability after auras were reworked.
- Stone of the Valrunes effect now includes Heavenly Strike in the active skill count, but the maximum active skill count used is capped at 4.
- Hero Skill Upgrades: Titan Gold Bonus replaced with Fairy Gold Bonus.
- Software optimizations

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed privacy link and added terms of service link to the options panel
- Tutorial panel in the options panel was removed; options panel buttons reorganized
- Shop showing reconnect button until the client was restarted
- See in-game Update History for more details

- Welcome stage 25k along with a new rocking music festival themed update!
- Pet skill and balance overhaul! Pets return to the battle now stronger than ever!
- Mana Potion and Doom overhauls: each now give new persisting effects for 12 hours.
- Fairy video reward overhauls: rewards are now much more beneficial.
- Skill tree level cap increases: level 25 for Tier I through III and level 15 for Tier IV (skills maxed at level 10 are unchanged).
- 40 New equipment pieces: 30 standard additions and 10 limited time event equipment.
- 5 New equipment sets, including the Ruthless Necromancer Mythic Set.
- 3 New Arifacts: Aura Boost, Manni Mana Spawn Chance, and Hero Weapon Boost!
- Scroll lists can now be expanded to fit full screen!
- Additional power options: disable screen shakes, special damage text, and boss entered text.
- New animation on max stage increases (plays at most once per prestige).
- Clan Quest contribution data export button for Masters and Grand Masters.

- Welcome stage 25k along with a new rocking music festival themed update!
- Pet skill and balance overhaul! Pets return to the battle now stronger than ever!
- Mana Potion and Doom overhauls: each now give new persisting effects for 12 hours.
- Fairy video reward overhauls: rewards are now much more beneficial.
- Skill tree level cap increases: level 25 for Tier I through III and level 15 for Tier IV (skills maxed at level 10 are unchanged).
- 40 New equipment pieces: 30 standard additions and 10 limited time event equipment.
- 5 New equipment sets, including the Ruthless Necromancer Mythic Set.
- 3 New Arifacts: Aura Boost, Manni Mana Spawn Chance, and Hero Weapon Boost!
- Scroll lists can now be expanded to fit full screen!
- Additional power options: disable screen shakes, special damage text, and boss entered text.
- New animation on max stage increases (plays at most once per prestige).
- Clan Quest contribution data export button for Masters and Grand Masters.

Fixes:
- Prestige crash due to equipment locks.
- Hand of Midas fairy not spawning.
- Tapping through scroll list bug.
- Silent March crash when player had 0 DPS.

Balance:
- Fairy diamond reward videos now give 10 diamonds.
- Fairy gold cost reduction reward videos now reduce all gold costs by 90%.
- Fairy activate all skills reward now appears when 4 active skills are unlocked.

Fixes:
- Shadow Clone including Unskilled Bonus damage when no other skills were active.
- Fight Boss button exploit allowing players to skip boss fights.
- Shop "new" icon showing too often.
- Additional scroll list fixes.
- Fairy gold cost reduction not resetting on prestige.
- Crashes associated with perk gold calculations.
- Fixed some issues with fairy videos not working properly.
- DPS calculation errors during inactive play.

Features:
- Stage 30k.
- Equipment Crafting improvements with guaranteed crafts and Crafting Power Levels!
- Welcome Back panel to display inactive progression.
- New special non boss Titan: Snap.
- 3 new equipment sets including the mythic Heavenly Strike set.
- 5 new Artifacts.
- Unskilled Gold/Damage rework.
- Tournament fixes
- Tournament Fixes

Features:
- New Captain Titan legendary equipment set that gives a boost to Knight builds.

Balance:
- Hand of Midas gold exponent increased from 0.5 to 0.6 for pet Heart of Midas, fairy, and splash gold.
- Midas Ultimate gives a much greater boost to Fairy Gold.
- Tactical Insight multiplicative bonuses stronger for all upgrade levels.
- Tournament rank 4 crafting shards and hero weapon rewards increased for higher level brackets.

Fixes:
- Artifacts have a minimum upgrade amount now to avoid some issues (only impacts high level players).
- Crashes and other errors relating to artifact upgrades.

Fixes:
- Artifact upgrade crashes when the upgrade cost is very large.
- Prevented some panels from being unintentionally closed (i.e. server maintenance).
- Skill tree bonus display for Cleaving Strike.

"Features:
- Enjoy the final days of summer with Stage 32k along with a new summer theme!
- Tournament improvements: player matching algorithm overhaul and new bonuses!
- New Warlord skill: Searing Light will boost your damage by weakening Titans!
- 4 new equipment sets: boost your active pet level with the new Fire Sword mythic set!
- 5 new artifacts: new gold and damage bonuses along with two powerful artifact effect multipliers!"

Features:
- New legendary set: the Frost Warden brings summer to a close with a powerful Warlord boost.
- 2 New artifacts: boost the gold and damage bonuses of your other artifacts.
- Higher resolution images for artifacts.
- Player reporting system improvements.

- New Loading Screen
- Raid log damage correctly calculated for each titan and sorted by titan order
- Tournament ID's no longer cut off on iPad resolutions
- Balance tweaks to Tier 3 Area and Enemy Effects

- Hallow's Eve has arrived! Collect Evil Souls from chests, tournaments, raids, diamond fairies, daily rewards, and daily achievements to move up the spooky path and earn epic rewards. Can you make it all the way to the haunted house?
- Enjoy the randomized loading screens - try and catch them all!
- Raid logs exported via the "Copy to Clipboard" button now list how much damage was done to each part.
- Added a Monthly Clan Leaderboard
- New Reddit and Instagram icons added to Bear Shop for diamonds rewards
- Artifact info panel updated to show invested relics/salvage value, lifetime relics invested, and disenchantment cost
- Added a panel that summarizes new content on every major release
- Stage cap increased to 84k
- Unlocked "Titania's Sceptre" artifact enchantment
- Added 2 new equipment sets: "Bone Mender" legendary set and "Grim Reaper" event set
- Pet Skill Cooldown % and Companion Skill Cooldown % added to stats panel
- Fixed diamond animation appearing behind panels
- Fixed sharing across different versions of the game (applies to skill tree builds and attack summaries)
- Fixed visual issue where small bits of titan lord armor would remain after destroying a part.
- Fixed Invisible Titan Lord

- Randomization of tier 3 area/enemy effects
- Rescaled practice titan Lemmy HP
- Clicking on "Clan Info" button opens the "members" tab first
- Edited clan chat colours
- Improved fairy ad load reliability

Fixes:
- iOS crashes related to non-English system language settings have been fixed.
- Attack summary now shows card levels of the player and not your own.
- Artifact disenchantment cost fixed.

- Arcane bargain resetting per prestige fix.
- Fixed issue where dust would appear to increase on failed dust purchases.
- Miscellaneous translation fixes

Features:
- Celebrate the end of the year by reaching stage 50k!
- Auto upgrade all heroes after each prestige! Unlock this feature by reaching stage 10k!

Balance:
- Titan HP scaling has been increased starting on stage 42k.
- Starting gold after prestige has been greatly increased.

Features:
- Winter ends early with the introduction of stage 55k!
- Increase your Sorcerer splash skip with the new Mystic Impact passive skill.
- 2 new equipment sets: Including the Eternal Monk legendary set!
- Major performance optimizations!

Balance:
- Ascension Lv.2 damage increased for all heroes.

Fixes:
- Better memory handling after each clan quest attack to help with memory related crashes.
- Damage per running active skill bonus was affecting inactive DPS.
- Tactical Insight bonus was being over-counted both when heroes were first ascended, as well as when the game was restarted.
- Shadow Clone damage snapshot becoming permanently disabled while Doom was active.
- Hero ascension gold cost bugs and rounding errors when using the buy max option.
- Various hero ascension visual fixes.
- Clan chat panel visual fixes and fixed issues where various objects could be tapped through this panel. 
- Owned equipment no longer shows as being new when collected equipment is auto-salvaged.
- Diamonds earned from auto-salvaging equipment now clearly displayed in the equipment rewards screen.
- Purchased equipment was being auto-salvaged in some cases.
- Issue where clan code search was limited to 5 characters.
- Various tutorial fixes.

Features:
- Reach stage 35k in this special spooky Halloween update!
- Hero Ascension level 2 is here; make your heroes stronger than ever!
- Share your skill tree builds with your clan mates directly in the clan chat!
- UI DPS display improvements: See the damage of your slash bonus type on the main screen!
- 2 New equipment sets, including the new Scarecrow Jack set!
- 2 New artifacts: active skill and artifact related damage boosts!

Balance:
- Ascension Lv.2 damage increased for all heroes.

Fixes:
- Better memory handling after each clan quest attack to help with memory related crashes.
- Damage per running active skill bonus was affecting inactive DPS.
- Tactical Insight bonus was being over-counted both when heroes were first ascended, as well as when the game was restarted.
- Shadow Clone damage snapshot becoming permanently disabled while Doom was active.
- Hero ascension gold cost bugs and rounding errors when using the buy max option.
- Various hero ascension visual fixes.
- Clan chat panel visual fixes and fixed issues where various objects could be tapped through this panel. 
- Owned equipment no longer shows as being new when collected equipment is auto-salvaged.
- Diamonds earned from auto-salvaging equipment now clearly displayed in the equipment rewards screen.
- Purchased equipment was being auto-salvaged in some cases.
- Issue where clan code search was limited to 5 characters.
- Various tutorial fixes.

Features:
- Winter is here along with a strong push to stage 42k!
- 2 New equipment sets: including the new Mechanized Sword mythic set!
- 5 New artifacts: each new bonus is themed after one of your heroes!
- Memory optimizations during clan quests!

Features:
- Celebrate the end of the year by reaching stage 50k!
- Auto upgrade all heroes after each prestige! Unlock this feature by reaching stage 10k!

Features:

Features:
- The long awaited Clan Raid update is finally here, along with Stage 70k!
- Titan Lords have evolved... battle as a clan against 6 new powerful Titan Lords in brand new raid environments.
- Collect 21 new Raid Cards to learn as you construct the perfect Deck to use in Raids!
- Earn new Hero Scrolls to increase the strength of your Hero Skills!
- Acquire Dust from Raid Rewards to upgrade your Raid Cards or unlock new Cards in the Dust Shop!
- 5 new artifacts have been added, bringing the total to up to 95!
- 2 new equipment sets: Including the Thundering Deity legendary set!
- Major main progression balance improvements!

Features:
- Tier 2 Raids now available!
- Ascension Lv. 3 added!

- Arcane bargain resetting per prestige fix.
- Fixed issue where dust would appear to increase on failed dust purchases.
- Miscellaneous translation fixes

Features:
- Summer is back with a brand new sports theme and a stage cap increase to 75k!
- Make artifacts even stronger with artifact enchantments!
- Raid attack summaries can now be directly shared in the clan chat!
